availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Owen Mahorney. Father of Zantyk Mahorney, Martha Mahorney, James M. Mahorney, Lewis Mahorney, Joseph Mahorney, Sarelda Jane Mahorney, and James N. Mahorney. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District No 1, p. 371B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No 1, p. 29.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No 1, p. 29.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #21681.
